hadiths.text: Abu Salih said:I was sitting with my father and there was also a boy with him. He got up and then returned. So my father mentioned a tradition on the authority of Abu Hurairah from the Prophet (ﷺ) saying: If anyone gets up from where he has been sitting and comes back to it, he has most right to it

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا قَامَ مِنْ مَجْلِسٍ ثُمَّ رَجَعَ
chapter.eng-name: If a person gets up from his seat then returns
